steps.description: 1. Locate the first contiguous patch of black (0) pixels that is completely surrounded on all sides by green (3) and fill that entire black patch with yellow (4).
2. Locate the second contiguous patch of black (0) pixels that is completely surrounded on all sides by green (3) and fill that entire black patch with yellow (4).
3. Locate the third contiguous patch of black (0) pixels that is completely surrounded on all sides by green (3) and fill that entire black patch with yellow (4).
4. Locate the fourth contiguous patch of black (0) pixels that is completely surrounded on all sides by green (3) and fill that entire black patch with yellow (4).
5. Locate the fifth contiguous patch of black (0) pixels that is completely surrounded on all sides by green (3) and fill that entire black patch with yellow (4).
6. Locate the sixth contiguous patch of black (0) pixels that is completely surrounded on all sides by green (3) and fill that entire black patch with yellow (4).
